title: 069 - Nice.. Featuring The Return Of Mitt
description: On today's show, the guys recap Pat and Digs' weddings and some of their favorite moments from each, and Pat stops in to give a recap of his honeymoon and how a jet ski rental salesman did his best to try and ruin the entire thing. Plus, our resident boozebag, Mitt rejoins the show for the Pod FOD and Gumpy calls in from Canada to help rundown everything else in the Folder of Death. Don't forget to send in your submissions for the Pod FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We're off on Wednesday due to travel, but we'll see you all on Friday. Enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
